alert.note: Alert for Deschutes (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 18 at 9:01PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM PDT FOR WEST CENTRAL DESCHUTES COUNTY... At 900 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles west of Deschutes River Woods, or 12 miles west of Bend, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Deschutes County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Pendleton Oregon.
